db:abstract.db:para: The RenderStateSet FrameGraph node offers a way of specifying a set of RenderState objects to be applied during the execution of a framegraph branch.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: States set on a RenderStateSet are set globally, contrary to the per-material states that can be set on a RenderPass. By default, an empty RenderStateSet will result in all render states being disabled when executed. Adding a RenderState state explicitly enables that render state at runtime.
The RenderStateSet is enabled when added to the active frame graph:

db:section.db:title: renderStates : list<RenderState>
db:section.db:para: Holds the list of RenderState objects used by the RenderStateSet.
